TitleEnglish: Apprentice Nail Painter in a Foreign Land
SummaryEnglish: Keiko Sahara, an office worker whose hobby is designing cute gel nails, is sent to a world where people's magic abilities come from their nail art. After a magic nail artist notices her ability, she becomes his apprentice!
Aliases: Apprentice Nail Artist in a Foreign Land
異世界でジェルネイル
